rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/why-does-britain-need-more-female-engineers">     <title>Why does Britain need more female engineers?</title> rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/studying-engineering/studying-civil-engineering">     <title>Studying civil engineering</title>  <title>Does the UK need more engineers?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/does-the-uk-need-more-engineers</link>     <description>A government advisor says that not enough young people want to become engineers - despite the career opportunities available.</description>     <dc:date>2013-11-04T16:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/careers-in-engineering/transferable-skills-from-engineering">     <title>Transferable skills from engineering</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/careers-in-engineering/transferable-skills-from-engineering</link>     <description>Most engineering graduates go on to engineering rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/studying-engineering/engineering-events">     <title>Engineering events</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/studying-engineering/engineering-events</link>     <description>Engineering is all about getting things done in the real world, so adding these events to your studies can be a valuable experience.</description>     <dc:date>2013-08-09T16:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/human-powered-helicopter-wins-prize-after-33-year-wait">     <title>Human-powered helicopter wins prize after 33 year wait</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/human-powered-helicopter-wins-prize-after-33-year-wait</link>     <description>A team of students and graduates flew their bike-based helicopter for more than a minute to win the $250,000 Sikorsky prize.</description>     <dc:date>2013-07-15T15:39:13Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/careers-in-engineering/freelance-engineering">     <title>Freelance engineering</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/careers-in-engineering/freelance-engineering</link>     <description>Working as an engineer doesn't mean joining a firm: freelance work lets you work for yourself on a variety of interesting projects.</description>     <dc:date>2013-07-05T14:10:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/hi-tech-contact-lenses-could-give-you-zoom-vision">     <title>Hi-tech contact lenses could give you zoom vision</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/hi-tech-contact-lenses-could-give-you-zoom-vision</link>     <description>The new lenses let users switch between ordinary vision and 2.8x zoom.</description>     <dc:date>2013-07-04T14:01:12Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/new-speed-record-for-electric-car"> rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/careers-in-engineering/my-job-explained-mechanical-design-engineer">     <title>My job explained: Mechanical design Find out more about his job in the defence industry.</description>     <dc:date>2013-06-17T15:45:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/what-innovation-is-worth-ps1-000-000">     <title>What innovation is worth \ufffd\ufffd1,000,000?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/what-innovation-is-worth-ps1-000-000</link>     <description>The Prime Minister has announced a new prize for innovation - but hasn't rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/features-and-resources/firm-profile-atkins">     <title>Firm profile: Atkins</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/features-and-resources/firm-profile-atkins</link>     <description>WS Atkins - more often known just as Atkins - is a global engineering rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/mini-helicopters-move-into-mind-reading-and-pizza-delivery">     <title>Mini-helicopters move into mind-reading and pizza rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/studying-engineering/studying-engineering-abroad">     <title>Studying engineering abroad</title> rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/engineering/careers-in-engineering/my-job-explained-automotive-engineer-at-jaguar-land-rover">     <title>My job explained: Automotive engineer <description>Find out how Peter Waitland turned his love of cars into an automotive engineering career with Jaguar Land Rover.</description>     <dc:date>2013-04-26T16:15:00Z</dc:date>   </item>
